thread.title: Running On the Treadmill With Your Hands Is Damn Impressive
thread.title_full: Running On the Treadmill With Your Hands Is Damn Impressive

author: Barry K
title: Running On the Treadmill With Your Hands Is Damn Impressive
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
There are plenty of awesome ways to use the treadmill and burn more fat while doing it . However, one method we haven't considered in the past is using your hands to run on the treadmill. Truthfully, you shouldn't expect us to recommend that technique any time soon; however, that doesn't make the trick this woman pulled off any less impressive. Advertisement
